attachments.fallback: #12994 Ui Fix : Remove unnecessary outer scroll from the Add/Edit Role Form in RBAC
attachments.text:
*Describe the bug*

• When the form is opened, a vertical scrollbar appears even though the content fits within the modal/view area. This affects the UX by giving a false sense of overflowing content.
• There is minimal vertical spacing between the form labels and their corresponding text fields, making the UI feel cramped and less readable.

*To Reproduce*  
Steps to reproduce the behavior:

1. Go to 'Admin Dashboard'
2. Click on 'RBAC'
3. Click on 'Add Role'
4. See error

*Expected behavior*

• Remove the unwanted scroll of the form.
• Add spacing below labels

*Screenshots*

Add.role.ui.fix.mp4 

*Desktop (please complete the following information):*

• OS: [e.g. iOS]
• Browser [e.g. chrome, safari]
• Version [e.g. 22]

*Smartphone (please complete the following information):*

• Device: [e.g. iPhone6]
• OS: [e.g. iOS8.1]
• Browser [e.g. stock browser, safari]
• Version [e.g. 22]

*Additional context*  
Add any other context about the problem here.

---

### :rotating_light: DO NOT EDIT BELOW THIS LINE :rotating_light:

### Instructions for Requesting Assignment:

To request assignment, please clearly outline your solution and timeline by commenting on the issue using the format below:

*Describe your solution clearly:*  
Provide a detailed explanation of your proposed solution, including your approach, key implementation steps, and relevant examples or references. Mention any dependencies, assumptions, or risks you foresee that might affect your timeline or implementation.

*Expected Timeline:*

• End date: [Expected submission date of a completed Pull Request]

*Additional Context:*  
Include any other relevant context, links, screenshots, or resources that support your proposed solution.

> :rotating_light: Your assignment may be unassigned if there is no activity or progress within the stated timeline unless communicated clearly and agreed upon.

## Merge Checklist

• Add specs that demonstrate the bug or test the new feature.
• Update <https://docs.ohc.network|product documentation>.
• Ensure that UI text is placed in I18n files.
• Prepare a screenshot or demo video for the changelog entry and attach it to the issue.
• Request peer reviews.
• Complete QA on mobile devices.
• Complete QA on desktop devices.

## Summary by CodeRabbit

• *Style*  
   • Updated Healthcare Service cards to a more compact, responsive layout.  
   • Consolidated actions into a single inline “View details” button with an arrow icon.  
   • Improved alignment and spacing across breakpoints; content centers and reflows cleanly on medium+ screens.  
   • Enhanced text handling with truncation to prevent overflow and preserve layout.  
   • Standardized icon sizing and layering for clearer visuals.

<https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/114755271/473807445-af7fb8ce-925c-4a3a-91ee-4bc4fba8d3e5.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJnaXRodWIuY29tIiwiYXVkIjoicmF3LmdpdGh1YnVzZXJjb250ZW50LmNvbSIsImtleSI6ImtleTUiLCJleHAiOjE3NTUzNjQ5NjksIm5iZiI6MTc1NTM2NDY2OSwicGF0aCI6Ii8xMTQ3NTUyNzEvNDczODA3NDQ1LWFmN2ZiOGNlLTkyNWMtNGEzYS05MWVlLTRiYzRmYmE4ZDNlNS5wbmc_.GK4r3Lsa4EkxR1iQGnVzQdzjP6cyJenwieXrRCgEhXs|[image](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/114755271/473807445-af7fb8ce-925c-4a3a-91ee-4bc4fba8d3e5.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJnaXRodWIuY29tIiwiYXVkIjoicmF3LmdpdGh1YnVzZXJjb250ZW50LmNvbSIsImtleSI6ImtleTUiLCJleHAiOjE3NTUzNjQ5NjksIm5iZiI6MTc1NTM2NDY2OSwicGF0aCI6Ii8xMTQ3NTUyNzEvNDczODA3NDQ1LWFmN2ZiOGNlLTkyNWMtNGEzYS05MWVlLTRiYzRmYmE4ZDNlNS5wbmc_.GK4r3Lsa4EkxR1iQGnVzQdzjP6cyJenwieXrRCgEhXs)> <https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/114755271/473807482-a79b6390-4029-49ba-8338-caab79a58c91.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJnaXRodWIuY29tIiwiYXVkIjoicmF3LmdpdGh1YnVzZXJjb250ZW50LmNvbSIsImtleSI6ImtleTUiLCJleHAiOjE3NTUzNjQ5NjksIm5iZiI6MTc1NTM2NDY2OSwicGF0aCI6Ii8xMTQ3NTUyNzEvNDczODA3NDgyLWE3OWI2MzkwLTQwMjktNDliYS04MzM4LWNhYWI3OWE1OGM5MS5wbmc_.y3pzhIVye9XFFJPh9utgtHJC7nmNS_bTIwAIslGRYTI|[image](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/114755271/473807482-a79b6390-4029-49ba-8338-caab79a58c91.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJnaXRodWIuY29tIiwiYXVkIjoicmF3LmdpdGh1YnVzZXJjb250ZW50LmNvbSIsImtleSI6ImtleTUiLCJleHAiOjE3NTUzNjQ5NjksIm5iZiI6MTc1NTM2NDY2OSwicGF0aCI6Ii8xMTQ3NTUyNzEvNDczODA3NDgyLWE3OWI2MzkwLTQwMjktNDliYS04MzM4LWNhYWI3OWE1OGM5MS5wbmc_.y3pzhIVye9XFFJPh9utgtHJC7nmNS_bTIwAIslGRYTI)> 

@ohcnetwork/care-fe-code-reviewers

## Merge Checklist

• Add specs that demonstrate bug / test a new feature.
• Update <https://docs.ohc.network|product documentation>.
• Ensure that UI text is kept in I18n files.
• Prep screenshot or demo video for changelog entry, and attach it to issue.
• Request for Peer Reviews
• Completion of QA in Mobile Devices
• Completion of QA in Desktop Devices

## Summary by CodeRabbit

• *Style*  
   • Improved layout and spacing of product details, product knowledge, and charge item definition for clearer visual hierarchy.  
   • Enhanced responsiveness so sections stack on small screens and align in rows on larger screens.  
   • Buttons now adapt to screen size (full width on small screens, auto width on larger screens).
• *Localization*  
   • Added a new "product_id" label to English locale and reorganized a confirmation label position.

## Proposed Changes

Fixes <https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/issues/13329|#13329>

• add flex col for small devices
• wrapped the icon and text together
• made the View Details button in full width in small devices
<https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/114755271/477412147-2620040d-52c0-4245-9465-81351552cb71.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJnaXRodWIuY29tIiwiYXVkIjoicmF3LmdpdGh1YnVzZXJjb250ZW50LmNvbSIsImtleSI6ImtleTUiLCJleHAiOjE3NTU4MDAwNTAsIm5iZiI6MTc1NTc5OTc1MCwicGF0aCI6Ii8xMTQ3NTUyNzEvNDc3NDEyMTQ3LTI2MjAwNDBkLTUyYzAtNDI0NS05NDY1LTgxMzUxNTUyY2I3MS5wbmc_.NVfaB_nZGiAR5g_NVrXsLBCF5wwncuygTrxgZ6vgtjc|[image](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/114755271/477412147-2620040d-52c0-4245-9465-81351552cb71.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJnaXRodWIuY29tIiwiYXVkIjoicmF3LmdpdGh1YnVzZXJjb250ZW50LmNvbSIsImtleSI6ImtleTUiLCJleHAiOjE3NTU4MDAwNTAsIm5iZiI6MTc1NTc5OTc1MCwicGF0aCI6Ii8xMTQ3NTUyNzEvNDc3NDEyMTQ3LTI2MjAwNDBkLTUyYzAtNDI0NS05NDY1LTgxMzUxNTUyY2I3MS5wbmc_.NVfaB_nZGiAR5g_NVrXsLBCF5wwncuygTrxgZ6vgtjc)> 

Tagging: @ohcnetwork/care-fe-code-reviewers

## Merge Checklist

• Add specs that demonstrate the bug or test the new feature.
• Update <https://docs.ohc.network|product documentation>.
• Ensure that UI text is placed in I18n files.
• Prepare a screenshot or demo video for the changelog entry and attach it to the issue.
• Request peer reviews.
• Complete QA on mobile devices.
• Complete QA on desktop devices.

## Summary by CodeRabbit

• *Refactor*  
   • Extracted per-service UI into a reusable ServiceCard component; service list pages now render ServiceCard for each item, delegating presentation and navigation.
• *Style*  
   • Redesigned Healthcare Service cards for a more compact, responsive two-zone layout (stacked on small screens, side-by-side on md+).  
   • Consolidated actions into a single inline “View details” button (full-width on small screens, right-aligned on md+); improved alignment, spacing, icon consistency and text truncation.

Tagging: @ohcnetwork/care-fe-code-reviewers

## Merge Checklist

• Add specs that demonstrate the bug or test the new feature.
• Update <https://docs.ohc.network|product documentation>.
• Ensure that UI text is placed in I18n files.
• Prepare a screenshot or demo video for the changelog entry and attach it to the issue.
• Request peer reviews.
• Complete QA on mobile devices.
• Complete QA on desktop devices.

## Summary by CodeRabbit

• *Style*  
   • Repositioned the “See Details” button in Product Knowledge cards to its own row below the product header, improving visual hierarchy and readability.  
   • Enhanced alignment and spacing for a cleaner layout, especially on smaller screens, reducing header crowding.
• *Bug Fixes*  
   • Standardized the “See Details” control across card, mobile and table views and updated its target to a unified product knowledge page, ensuring consistent navigation.
